code:
classDiagram
    class User {
        +UUID id
        +String name
        +String whatsapp
        +String customMessage
        +Time checkTime
        +Boolean isActive
        +PaymentStatus paymentStatus
        +Timestamp createdAt
        +Timestamp updatedAt
    }

    class EmergencyContact {
        +UUID id
        +UUID userId
        +String name
        +String whatsapp
        +Integer order
        +Timestamp createdAt
        +Timestamp updatedAt
    }

    class DailyCheck {
        +UUID id
        +UUID userId
        +Timestamp sentAt
        +ResponseType response
        +Timestamp respondedAt
        +Timestamp createdAt
    }

    class Alert {
        +UUID id
        +UUID userId
        +TriggerType triggerType
        +String messageSent
        +Timestamp triggeredAt
        +Timestamp createdAt
    }

    class AlertNotification {
        +UUID id
        +UUID alertId
        +UUID emergencyContactId
        +NotificationStatus status
        +Timestamp sentAt
        +String errorMessage
        +Integer retryCount
        +Timestamp createdAt
    }

    User "1" --> "1..3" EmergencyContact : has
    User "1" --> "0..*" DailyCheck : receives
    User "1" --> "0..*" Alert : triggers
    Alert "1" --> "1..*" AlertNotification : generates
    AlertNotification "*" --> "1" EmergencyContact : sent to

    class PaymentStatus {
        <<enumeration>>
        PENDING
        CONFIRMED
        FAILED
    }

    class ResponseType {
        <<enumeration>>
        OK
        HELP
        NO_RESPONSE
    }

    class TriggerType {
        <<enumeration>>
        DAILY_CHECK
        MANUAL
    }

    class NotificationStatus {
        <<enumeration>>
        PENDING
        SENT
        FAILED
    }
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
